sourcesContent:
import { Dropdown, Navbar, Nav, Form, Container, FormControl, Button, DropdownButton } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './bootstrap.min.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import React from 'react' const Topbar = () => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.user) const navigate = useNavigate() const logo = () => { user > 0 ? navigate('/products') : navigate('/login') } const logout = () => { window.localStorage.removeItem('persist:root') navigate('/') } return ( LOGO
{localStorage.key.length > 0 ? <> {user.isAdmin === true ? <> Users New Product Products
: <>Products
} : <>}
) } export default Topbar
